question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of quipment that you use for your job.Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter-describe the problem with the equipment-explain how this problem is affecting your work-say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing with regards to my dissatisfaction that I bought a laptop in your company,but the CD-ROM did not work.If needed my purchase number is A2180.

When it arrived, I enjoyed the design at the first glance and decided to watch my project with my colleague,but whatever tried, I could not open the CD-ROM.Moreover,I restarted the system, but this effort was futile.

I have worked as a project manager for a company,and I am going to deliver the project next week.You cannot imagine this inconvenience how will affect my career future.Furthermore, I wanted to have a meeting with my boss about this project tonight,but due to fault I cannot make the meeting.
As the laptop is under warranty, I am entitled to ask for it to be repaired or replaced.I would also like you to phone me personally when you receive this letter.
I believe this matter deserves your urgent attention,

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase due to fault. Consider adding a comma.
